name: Flor Sanders
statement: An ambitious and dynamic engineer with a broad technical background, who is on a mission to solve real-world practical problems using innovative technologies.

experience.label: Freelance full-stack web developer
experience.description: Built a full-stack webapp to manage, create, send and analyze surveys using React, GraphQL and Node.js.

experience.label: Freelance full-stack web developer
experience.description: Resolved technical debt in Ember.js projects powered by semantic data models for the Flemish government and Wageningen UR.

experience.label: Research intern
experience.description: Researched the use of Solid Pods to store IoT sensor data in a distributed network.

experience.label: Frontend web developer - student job
experience.description: Designed and developed a website for my mother's optician shop, using HTML, CSS and Vanilla JS.

experience.label: On-demand 3D printing service
experience.description: Offered an on-demand 3D printing service on the 3D hubs platform with a focus on affordable prices, happy clients and rapid turnovers.

extracurriculars.label: Assistent chef course
extracurriculars.description: Following classes to further improve my cooking skills, allowing me to provide the people around me with tasty and healthy meals.

extracurriculars.label: Student body representative
extracurriculars.description: Defending the interests of students in various committees at the Faculty of Engineering and Architecture.

extracurriculars.label: Student startup trip
extracurriculars.description: Selected to be among 35 Flemish students to explore the Belgian startup and scaleup scene during the Easter holidays.

extracurriculars.label: Praesidium member
extracurriculars.description:
Managed the finances of the faculty student council.
Helped students navigate their studies during the covid pandemic.

extracurriculars.label: Cook & kitchen chef
extracurriculars.description: Prepared 4 to 5 fresh meals per day for groups of up to 160 people at summer camps for learning the French language.

extracurriculars.label: Seeds for the future programme
extracurriculars.description: Selected to be among 10 Belgian students to visit Huawei's headquarters in Shenzhen and learn about 5G technology over the summer holidays.
